description: Undercover officer Connor Halstead is still on the job trying to catch men who pay for sex, but the muscular hunk has been playing both sides, and making a profit off his “clients.” Beefy officer Draven Navarro has been suspicious of him, and set up a cam in the room to spy on him. He catches Connor in the act with ripped Darin Silvers, but instead of arresting him, he strips down and demands this twosome become a threesome.
title: The Sting Part 3
